roadmapItems.title: Release 1.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Initial release with key features and bug fixes.

children.title: Rich Text Editor
children.description: Providing an advanced rich text editor for content creation.

children.title: Resolved formatting issues with bullet points.
children.description: Fixed problems with bullet point formatting in the editor.

children.title: Fixed image alignment bugs.
children.description: Corrected alignment issues with images in the editor.

children.title: Added support for advanced text formatting options.
children.description: Introduced new formatting options for rich text editing.

children.title: Introduced drag-and-drop image embedding.
children.description: Added drag-and-drop functionality for easier image embedding.

children.title: Multimedia Support
children.description: Enhancing support for multimedia content.

children.title: Corrected video playback issues.
children.description: Fixed bugs affecting video playback in posts.

children.title: Fixed bugs in audio file uploads.
children.description: Resolved issues with uploading audio files.

children.title: Added support for embedding YouTube and Vimeo videos.
children.description: Introduced embedding support for YouTube and Vimeo videos.

children.title: Implemented an integrated media library for easy access.
children.description: Added a media library for easier management of multimedia files.

children.title: Social Media Integration
children.description: Improving social media integration for better sharing and interaction.

children.title: Resolved issues with social media sharing links.
children.description: Fixed problems with links for sharing posts on social media.

children.title: Added automatic post scheduling for social media platforms.
children.description: Introduced scheduling features for social media posts.

children.title: Improved social media post preview functionality.
children.description: Enhanced the preview function for social media posts.

roadmapItems.title: Release 1.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements to user comments and SEO tools.

children.title: User Comments
children.description: Improving user comment functionality and moderation.

children.title: Fixed issues with comment moderation.
children.description: Resolved problems with moderating user comments.

children.title: Resolved duplicate comment submission bugs.
children.description: Fixed issues causing duplicate comments to be submitted.

children.title: Added support for threaded comments.
children.description: Introduced threaded comment support for better discussions.

children.title: Introduced upvote and downvote features for comments.
children.description: Added features to upvote and downvote comments for better interaction.

children.title: SEO Tools
children.description: Enhancing SEO tools for better website optimization.

children.title: Corrected meta tag generation errors.
children.description: Fixed errors in the generation of meta tags for SEO.

children.title: Added real-time SEO analysis and suggestions.
children.description: Introduced tools for real-time SEO analysis and suggestions.

children.title: Implemented automated sitemap generation.
children.description: Added features for automatic generation of sitemaps.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with theme customization and analytics integration.

children.title: Theme Customization
children.description: Providing advanced theme customization options.

children.title: Resolved bugs with theme switching.
children.description: Fixed issues encountered when switching themes.

children.title: Fixed issues with theme color customizations.
children.description: Resolved problems with customizing theme colors.

children.title: Added a variety of new themes.
children.description: Introduced a range of new themes for better customization.

children.title: Implemented advanced theme customization options.
children.description: Added advanced options for customizing themes in detail.

children.title: Analytics Integration
children.description: Integrating advanced analytics tools for better insights.

children.title: Fixed data discrepancies in traffic reports.
children.description: Resolved issues causing discrepancies in traffic analytics.

children.title: Added support for Google Analytics integration.
children.description: Introduced integration with Google Analytics for better data.

children.title: Introduced detailed readership statistics and reporting.
children.description: Added features for detailed readership analysis and reporting.

children.title: Content Scheduling
children.description: Enhancing content scheduling capabilities for better planning.

children.title: Resolved issues with scheduled post publishing.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the publishing of scheduled posts.

children.title: Added calendar view for content scheduling.
children.description: Introduced a calendar view to help with scheduling content.

children.title: Implemented automated post scheduling with reminders.
children.description: Added features for automated scheduling and reminder notifications.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Focused on enhancing the media library and editor features.

children.title: Enhanced Media Library
children.description: Improving the media library for better file management.

children.title: Fixed bugs in media file organization.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the organization of media files.

children.title: Resolved issues with media file search.
children.description: Fixed problems encountered during media file searches.

children.title: Introduced categorization and tagging for media files.
children.description: Added features for categorizing and tagging media files.

children.title: Added bulk upload and management features.
children.description: Introduced bulk upload options and management tools for media files.

children.title: Advanced Editor Features
children.description: Enhancing the editor with advanced features.

children.title: Corrected issues with table formatting.
children.description: Fixed bugs affecting the formatting of tables in the editor.

children.title: Resolved bugs with code snippet embedding.
children.description: Fixed issues encountered when embedding code snippets.

children.title: Added support for custom HTML and CSS.
children.description: Introduced support for adding custom HTML and CSS in posts.

children.title: Improved markdown support.
children.description: Enhanced markdown support for better formatting options.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with multi-user collaboration and mobile optimization.

children.title: Multi-User Collaboration
children.description: Introducing collaboration features for multiple users.

children.title: Resolved issues with simultaneous editing.
children.description: Fixed bugs affecting simultaneous editing by multiple users.

children.title: Fixed bugs with user role assignments.
children.description: Resolved issues with assigning roles to different users.

children.title: Added real-time collaborative editing.
children.description: Introduced real-time editing features for better collaboration.

children.title: Introduced advanced user permissions and roles.
children.description: Added advanced options for managing user permissions and roles.

children.title: Mobile Optimization
children.description: Enhancing mobile responsiveness and design options.

children.title: Corrected layout issues on mobile devices.
children.description: Fixed layout problems affecting the mobile version of the site.

children.title: Fixed bugs with mobile editor functionality.
children.description: Resolved issues encountered when using the editor on mobile devices.

children.title: Improved mobile responsiveness of the entire application.
children.description: Enhanced the mobile responsiveness of the application for better user experience.

children.title: Added mobile-specific design options for posts.
children.description: Introduced design options specifically for mobile posts.

children.title: Newsletter Integration
children.description: Introducing integration features for newsletters.

children.title: Fixed issues with email template formatting.
children.description: Resolved formatting issues in email templates.

children.title: Added support for automated newsletter creation.
children.description: Introduced automation features for creating newsletters.

children.title: Implemented integration with popular email marketing services.
children.description: Added integration support for various email marketing platforms.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Focus on advanced SEO features, custom widgets, and enhanced security.

children.title: Advanced SEO Features
children.description: Enhancing SEO tools for better website optimization.

children.title: Corrected errors in backlink analysis.
children.description: Fixed errors affecting backlink analysis for SEO.

children.title: Added advanced keyword research tools.
children.description: Introduced advanced tools for keyword research.

children.title: Implemented competitor SEO analysis.
children.description: Added features for analyzing competitors' SEO strategies.

children.title: Custom Widgets
children.description: Adding customizable widgets for better post interaction.

children.title: Fixed bugs in widget integration.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting widget integration in posts.

children.title: Resolved issues with widget customization.
children.description: Fixed problems with customizing widgets.

children.title: Introduced a variety of customizable widgets for posts.
children.description: Added new widgets that users can customize for their posts.

children.title: Added support for third-party widget integrations.
children.description: Introduced support for integrating third-party widgets.

children.title: Enhanced Security
children.description: Improving security features for better protection.

children.title: Resolved vulnerabilities in user authentication.
children.description: Fixed security vulnerabilities in user authentication.

children.title: Implemented two-factor authentication.
children.description: Introduced two-factor authentication for enhanced security.

children.title: Added advanced spam protection for comments and contact forms.
children.description: Implemented advanced spam protection features for comments and forms.
